dcterms:description: The CVDN dataset collects 2050 human-human navigation dialogs and over 7k trajectories in 83 MatterPort houses. Each trajectory corresponds to several question-answer exchanges, beginning with an ambiguous instruction, leading the navigator to find the target.
dcterms:title: CVDN dataset
